1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall -fno-warn-orphans #-}
3
4-- | HTML output.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Writer.Html
7  ( resultHtmlIndented,
8    resultHtmlCompact,
9    contToHtml,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified System.IO                          as IO
13import qualified Text.Blaze.XHtml5                  as H
14import           Text.Blaze.XHtml5                  ((!))
15import           Text.Blaze.XHtml5.Attributes       (class_)
16import qualified Text.Blaze.Html.Renderer.Pretty    as Hi
17import qualified Text.Blaze.Html.Renderer.String    as Hc
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base               as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data               as D
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax             as S
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core               as C
23
24-- | HTML output in indent format.
25resultHtmlIndented :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
26resultHtmlIndented = C.ResultWriterChunk "html-indented" (hPutHtml Hi.renderHtml)
27
28-- | HTML output in linear format.
29resultHtmlCompact :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
30resultHtmlCompact  = C.ResultWriterChunk "html-compact"  (hPutHtml Hc.renderHtml)
31
32hPutHtml :: (D.CContent c) => (H.Html -> String) -> C.ResultWriterChunk c
33hPutHtml render h _ status sh =
34    do hPutRel h render sh
35       return status
36
37hPutRel :: (D.CContent c) => IO.Handle -> (H.Html -> String) -> [C.ShortResultChunks c] -> IO ()
38hPutRel h render sh = mapM_ put chunks where
39    chunks = concatMap S.shortBody sh
40    put (C.ResultRel cl r) = IO.hPutStrLn h $ render $ html cl r
41    put _                  = return ()
42    html cl r = H.div ! class_ "named-relation" $ do
43                  H.p ! class_ "name" $ H.toMarkup cl
44                  contToHtml O.nothing $ D.pRel r
45
46-- | Encode term content in HTML.
47contToHtml :: (D.CContent c) => B.TransString -> c -> H.Html
48contToHtml sh = content where
49    content c
50        | D.isRel c = rel $ D.gRel c
51        | otherwise = H.toMarkup $ B.mixToFlatString $ B.mixTransEncode sh c
52
53    rel (D.Rel he bo) =
54        H.table ! class_ "relation" $ do
55          let terms = term `map` D.getTermNames he
56          H.tr ! class_ "heading" $ mapM_ H.td terms
57          mapM_ row bo
58
59    row cs = H.tr ! class_ "tuple" $ mapM_ col cs
60    col c  = H.td $ contToHtml sh c
61    term   = (H.span ! class_ "termname") . H.toMarkup . S.termNameString
62
63--  HTML
64--
65--    Aborted
66--
67--    {main reason}
68--      {detailed reason}
69--      {detailed reason}
70--
71--    {line #} {col #} {filename}
72--      {line text}
73--    {line #} {col #} {filename}
74--      {line text}
75
76-- | Encode abort reason in HTML.
77instance H.ToMarkup B.AbortReason where
78    toMarkup a =
79        div_ "abort" $ do
80          div_ "abort-title"   $ text "Aborted"
81          div_ "abort-reason"  $ text $ B.abortReason a
82          div_ "abort-detail"  $ mapM_ detail  $ B.abortDetail a
83          div_ "abort-source"  $ mapM_ code $ B.abortPoint a
84        where
85          text n          = H.toMarkup (n :: String)
86          detail x        = H.div $ H.toMarkup x
87          code (cp, tag)  = point cp tag >> line cp
88          line p          = div_ "abort-line" $ text $ B.cpText p
89          source k n c    = span_ k $ text n >> (H.toMarkup c)
90          point cp tag    = div_ "abort-point" $ do
91                                  source "abort-point-line"    "Line "    $ B.cpLineNo cp
92                                  source "abort-point-column"  "Column "  $ B.cpColumnNo cp
93                                  source "abort-point-context" "Context " tag
94
95-- | 'H.div' with class name.
96div_ :: H.AttributeValue -> O.Map H.Html
97div_ c = H.div H.! class_ c
98
99-- | 'H.span' with class name.
100span_ :: H.AttributeValue -> O.Map H.Html
101span_ c = H.span H.! class_ c
102
